item.title: JASMIN Notebook Service
item.description: The JASMIN Notebook Service provides access to Jupyter Notebooks in the web browser. What is a Jupyter Notebook?   A Jupyter Notebook is an interactive document containing live code and visualisations that can be viewed and modified in a web browser.
